title: A Report on the Panel Presentations on Inclusive and Adaptive Education
content:
The 8th European Conference on Education (ECE2020) was held online, but was attended by more than two hundred delegates from more than 40 countries, and reached many thousands more as plenary sessions were streamed online and shared on social media as part of IAFORâ€™s continued outreach in response to the pandemic.
